name: Hell Cat
description:
A small game I made as a way to spend time while the Wowie jam started, Hell Cat is a game where you protect a lil kitty from being burned by the evil habitants of hell!

Notes:

  • Create fires with the mouse and the left click
  • Protect the kitty from all enemies (And your own fire)

Powerups:

  • Cross: Kills all enemies on-screen
  • Sand clock: Slows down incoming enemies
  • Pepper: Shields the kitty

Note: To delete all save data, press X, O, Right and Up at the same time
